clip.quote: Even if you don't like to dance, you should dance on video when the part of your personal life that you're bringing to social media is aligned.
clip.why_clipworthy: This challenges agents to step out of their comfort zones and find personal-professional alignment.
clip.suggested_hook: Why stepping out of your comfort zone can skyrocket your real estate career.

  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Why stepping out of your comfort zone can skyrocket your real estate career.",
    "SETUP": "Even if you don't like to dance, you should dance on video when the part of your personal life that you're bringing to social media is aligned. This is about real estate agents finding that sweet spot between personal and professional life.",
